name: xmarcos/elasticsearch-service-provider
description: A Silex Service Provider for Elasticsearch

suggest.silex/silex: Allows the registration of the ES client into a Silex container. Works with ~1.0|~2.0 versions.
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Needed for AWS token generation for interacting with an Elasticsearch hosted in AWS. Works with ^5.3.1|^6.2.1 versions.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Needed for AWS token generation for interacting with an Elasticsearch hosted in AWS. Works with ~3.0 version.
suggest.doctrine/cache: Needed for AWS token generation for interacting with an Elasticsearch hosted in AWS. Works with ~1.4 version.
